The following tests should only be ordered in certain clinical situations and require approval from the Microbiologist on call. The following tests can only be ordered by the laboratory: PJP NAT, Mycobacterium species NAT, Cytomegalovirus NAT and immunophenotyping. If these tests are required, page the Microbiologist (PJP NAT, Mycobacterium species NAT, Cytomegalovirus NAT) or Hematopathologist (immunophenotyping) on call to discuss the case and the Lab will initiate the order if indicated
